mapper.select: select count(*) from topicstatistics where topic = #{topic} and infodate = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')
mapper.insert: insert into topicstatistics (topic, infoDate, resultcount) values (#{item.topic}, #{item.infoDate}, #{item.resultCount})
mapper.select: select topic from videotopic where id = #{id}

select topic1, topic2, count(*) hardness from (select a.topic topic1, b.topic topic2 from videotopic a, videotopic b where a.id = b.id and a.topic != b.topic union all select a.topic topic1, b.topic topic2 from channeltopic a, channeltopic b where a.id = b.id and a.topic != b.topic) group by topic1, topic2 order by hardness desc

select * from ( select topic1, topic2, count(*) hardness from (select a.topic topic1, b.topic topic2 from videotopic a, videotopic b where a.id = b.id and a.topic != b.topic union all select a.topic topic1, b.topic topic2 from channeltopic a, channeltopic b where a.id = b.id and a.topic != b.topic) group by topic1, topic2 order by hardness desc ) where topic1 = #{topic} order by hardness desc
select * from topicstatistics where infodate = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, ('YY/MM/DD')) order by resultcount desc
select count(*) from idcomplete where id = #{id}
